index.title: Home
index.heading: The D3 Stat Lab
index.description: I love crunching data of all kinds. This site houses Division III Women's Basketball data (like NPI!).

publishing_tracker.title: Publishing Tracker
publishing_tracker.heading: Publishing Tracker
publishing_tracker.description: Track 2025-26 Schedule and Roster publishing progress.

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.Schedule Published?: Whether the team has published their 2025-26 season schedule
legend.Roster Published?: Whether the team has published their 2025-26 roster

preseason_rankings.title: 25-26 Preseason Rankings
preseason_rankings.heading: 25-26 Preseason Rankings
preseason_rankings.description: Way too early preseason rankings for the upcoming 2025-26 D3 WBB season.

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.Region: NCAA tournament region the team belongs to
legend.Returning: Percentage of scoring production returning from previous season
legend.Projected Preseason Rank: Projected ranking for the start of the season

returners.title: Returning and Non-Returning
returners.heading: Returning and Non-Returning
returners.description: For teams with published rosters, which teams have the most underclassmen minutes not returning, minutes incoming from D3 transfers, minutes returning from 5th years, and more.

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.Pub?: Whether the team has published their roster publicly
legend.Surp Gone: Unexpected player departures and lost minutes
legend.Exp Gone: Expected player departures and lost minutes
legend.Transfers In: Minutes gained from incoming D3 transfer players
legend.5th: Minutes by Fifth-year players returning for an additional season
legend.5th Year Last Names: Names of the fifth-year players on the roster

non_conf_tournaments.title: Non-Conference Tournaments
non_conf_tournaments.heading: Non-Conference Tournaments
non_conf_tournaments.description: A table listing the teams participating in various non-conference tournaments

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.Location: Host city and state where tournament was held
legend.Date: Date range when the tournament took place

npi.title: NPI
npi.heading: NPI
npi.description:
Daily NCAA Power Index (NPI) values, rankings, and analysis for D3 WBB.
This data is for the 2024-25 season and will be updated daily once the 2025-26 season starts until the end of the season.

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.NPI Value: Current NCAA Power Index numerical value
legend.Value Diff: Change in NPI value from previous calculation
legend.NPI Rank: Current national ranking based on NPI value
legend.Rank Diff: Change in ranking position from previous update
legend.Qual Games: Number of qualifying games included in NPI calculation
legend.Qual Wins: Number of qualifying wins counted in NPI
legend.Lowest Counting Win: NPI value of the weakest win that still counts
legend.Next Game Win NPI: Game NPI of next game, if won
legend.Potential Increase: NPI increase if next game is won
legend.Next Game Loss NPI: Game NPI of next game, if lost
legend.Rem Games < 50.00 NPI: Remaining games against teams with NPI below 50.00

season_simulations.title: Season Simulations
season_simulations.heading: Season Simulations
season_simulations.description:
D3 WBB season simulations, based off Efficiency Ratings, to project NCAA Qualification rates.
This data is for the 2024-25 season.

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.MedW: Median number of wins projected across simulations
legend.MedL: Median number of losses projected across simulations
legend.Tourn%: Percentage of simulations making the NCAA Tournament
legend.A%: Percentage of simulations winning their conference's AQ
legend.C%: Percentage of simulations getting an at-large bid
legend.ALWYNI%: Percentage of simulations NOT winning their conference's AQ, and getting an at-large bid
legend.F-C%: Percentage of simulations getting a Pool C when final loss was in conference finals
legend.SF-C%: Percentage of simulations getting a Pool C when final loss was in conference semifinals
legend.QF-C%: Percentage of simulations getting a Pool C when final loss was in conference quarterfinals
legend.Top4%: Percentage of simulations finishing in top 4 nationally
legend.Top8%: Percentage of simulations finishing in top 8 nationally
legend.Top16%: Percentage of simulations finishing in top 16 nationally

current_season_rankings.title: Current Season Rankings
current_season_rankings.heading: Current Season Rankings
current_season_rankings.description:
Ranking of teams based on this season's results.
This data is not updated for the 2025-26 season yet.

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.Value of Results: Numerical value representing quality of season results
legend.TOP 50 W: Number of wins against teams ranked in top 50
legend.OUT OF TOP 30 L: Number of losses to teams ranked outside top 30
legend.Overall Wins Massey: Total wins according to Massey ratings system
legend.Eff: Team efficiency rating for the current season

composite_rankings.title: Composite Rankings
composite_rankings.heading: Composite Rankings
composite_rankings.description:
Team Rankings based off median of NPI, Massey, Efficiency, and Current Season Results.
This data is not updated for the 2025-26 season yet.

legend.Team: Name of the college or university basketball team
legend.Region: NCAA tournament region the team belongs to
legend.Massey Rank: Team ranking according to Massey rating system
legend.Eff Rank: Team ranking based on efficiency metrics
legend.NPI Rank: Team ranking based on NCAA Power Index
legend.Curr Season Results Rank: Ranking based on current season performance
legend.MEDIAN: Median value across all ranking systems (not including preseason)
legend.Stdev: Standard deviation across different ranking systems

conference_rankings.title: Conference Rankings
conference_rankings.heading: Conference Rankings
conference_rankings.description:
Ranking of Conferences based off non-conference results.
This data is not updated for the 2025-26 season yet.

legend.Rank: Conference ranking position based on performance
legend.Region: Geographic region where the conference is located
legend.Win: Total wins by conference teams in non-conference play
legend.Loss: Total losses by conference teams in non-conference play
legend.Wins: Average Massey ranking of non-conference teams beat
legend.STAT: Statistical performance indicator for the conference

contact.title: Contact
contact.heading: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions about D3 basketball data or want to collaborate? Send me a message!
